name: Wyandot Center for Community Behavioral Healthcare, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Wyandot Center for Community Behavioral Healthcare, Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Kansas City, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $40.0M in Medicaid payments across 283K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $40.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
